de.pifpafpuf.web.urlparam

Class DateCodec

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.pifpafpuf.web.urlparam.DateCodec
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ParamCodec<Long>

    public class DateCodec
extends Object
implements ParamCodec<Long>
    Code and decode a String according to a DateFormat object into a time stamp.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      DateCodec(DateFormat df)
      creates a codec for the given format.
      DateCodec(DateFormat df, long minStamp, long maxStamp)
      creates a codec for the given format that, when decoding, only applies, if the resulting time stamp is in the closed interval given

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      String asString(Long e)
      converts the value into a String such that the ParamCodec.get(java.lang.String) method is able to convert it back.
      Long get(String value)
      decodes the String into a value.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • DateCodec

        public DateCodec(DateFormat df)
        creates a codec for the given format. Be sure to define the correct TimeZone for the given format for parsing dates and times. The result will differ up to 24*3600*1000 milliseconds from what you expect, if you leave the time zone arbitrary.
        Parameters:
        df - to be understood by SimpleDateFormat

      • DateCodec

        public DateCodec(DateFormat df,
         long minStamp,
         long maxStamp)
        creates a codec for the given format that, when decoding, only applies, if the resulting time stamp is in the closed interval given
        Parameters:
        df - to be understood by SimpleDateFormat
        minStamp - is the minimum allowed value for a parsed date
        maxStamp - is the maximum allowed value for a parsed date

    • Method Detail

      • asString

        public String asString(Long e)
        Description copied from interface: ParamCodec
        converts the value into a String such that the ParamCodec.get(java.lang.String) method is able to convert it back.
        Specified by:
        asString in interface ParamCodec<Long>
        Returns:
        may never be null. If e==null and the we cannot convert it to a string that the decoder makes into null again, throw NullPointerException.

      • get

        public Long get(String value)
        Description copied from interface: ParamCodec
        decodes the String into a value.
        Specified by:
        get in interface ParamCodec<Long>
        Returns:
        null if the string cannot be properly decoded.
